text: 10.36 Sng 107.20, Ais 52.7, 57.19, Mat 28.18, Lom 10.12, Lep 17.14 Pen God chɨnop Yislel binɨb dɨnɨg, takaw teplep agak ak nepɨm agak. Takaw anɨb ak anɨgɨl agñɨlak, God ne chɨn ayɨp kɨmɨgel mɨdon agɨl, Jisas Klays nop agyokek owak agɨlak agak. Jisas ne Bɨawl ak, chɨnop mɨdupsek kod mɨdeb agɨlak agak.
